class ConfigParser

Method Detail

parseXMLConfig

def parseXMLConfig()
A complicated XML file parser. This will parse the npa.xml file for known group types and then add checks objects to the CheckList. This method is still being developed and is NOT CURRENTLY IN USE - handled instead in StartChecks class

registerPlugins

def registerPlugins()
Register the internal plugins which are currently available

scheduleChecks

void scheduleChecks()
Schedule all checks, and setup a queue flushing mechanism. Queue will be flushed acording to the npa.flush_queue_ms setting in the defaults file. It will also be flushed when a JVM shutdown signal is received.
